response.original_title: Mr. Lobo's Easter Special: Jesus Christ Vampire Hunter
response.overview: On Easter, horror host Mr. Lobo and his silent co-host Miss Mittens settle in to watch and riff on the 2001 horror-comedy Jesus Christ Vampire Hunter. In this divine grindhouse spectacle, Jesus returns to Earth to judge humanityâ€”but before he can, he must join forces with a Mexican lucha libre fighter to battle a horde of vampires who can walk in the daylight.
response.tagline: They're not bad movies -- just misunderstood!
response.title: Mr. Lobo's Easter Special: Jesus Christ Vampire Hunter
